title: GAIA Lab - Sustainable AI Research
text:
At GAIA Lab, we apply state-of-the-art deep learning techniques to solve some of the most pressing challenges in sustainability:

Forests: Monitoring and preserving forests through remote sensing and AI-driven analysis.
Agriculture: Enhancing sustainable agriculture practices with data-driven decision-making.
Environmental Systems: Modeling and optimizing natural resources management using AI.

Our interdisciplinary team collaborates with researchers, industry leaders, and policymakers to develop AI solutions that have real-world impact.

title: GAIA Lab - Sustainable AI Research
text:
Our team is composed of AI researchers, environmental scientists, and engineers dedicated to solving sustainability challenges. Meet the team and learn about their contributions.

Meet the Team

title: GAIA Lab - Sustainable AI Research
text: If you are interested in collaborating or learning more about our research, feel free to reach out to us.
